alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene; Owen; Sullivan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 6:39PM EDT until May 07 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Sullivan County in southwestern Indiana... Southwestern Clay County in west central Indiana... Southwestern Owen County in west central Indiana... Western Greene County in southwestern Indiana... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 639 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sullivan, or 22 miles east of Robinson, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Dugger around 645 PM EDT. Linton, Jasonville, Vicksburg and Coalmont around 650 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lyons, Switz City and Worthington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
